title: Street War
summary: The Sleeping Giant brawl escalated into an all-out street war. Reinforcements poured out of the tavern, but the party fought with fury—Belden's drunken hammer smashing skulls, Kaelia's flames engulfing enemies, Semaj's magic missiles finding their marks, and Larry ripping out throats. Belden went down twice but kept getting back up. Valrex crushed the final Redbrand's skull against a wall. Victory—and Level 3.

best_moments.title: Belden: Drunken Master MVP
best_moments.description: Despite being drunk, Belden dodged attacks and crushed skulls all night. He went down twice but kept getting back up to fight.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: The drunken master for the win—he was dodging every dude and killing everybody.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Belden MVP. That was some pretty amazing stuff.

quotes.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes.text: I went into a big battle, killed a couple guys, and then went down in a blaze of glory. Woke up to dead bodies.

best_moments.title: Larry Rips Out Another Throat
best_moments.description: After getting slashed repeatedly, Larry got his revenge—lunging at a Redbrand and tearing out his throat.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: Larry gives me a look that says 'I got this.' And then I want him to just go for the throat and just rip out his throat.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: He lunges into the air, catches the Redbrand by the throat. You see him land on the ground with his throat in his mouth. And he just starts ripping.

best_moments.title: Belden's Throat Slashed
best_moments.description: A dying Redbrand cut Belden across the throat, dropping him unconscious. Then stabbed him while he was down.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: He cuts you straight across the throat. You fall to the ground, unconscious and incapacitated. And with his second swing, he walks up to you and stabs you onto the ground.

best_moments.title: Valrex's Skull-Crushing Finish
best_moments.description: Valrex ended the battle by running up and smashing the final Redbrand's skull into the wall.

quotes.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes.text: He takes all that fury and just runs up and grabs his Warhammer and comes out and slams and crushes his skull in.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: You see a smirk on his face as he pulls the sword out of Belden's belly. And he's looking at you as you run up to him, and you just see a smile as his head gets smashed into the wall.

best_moments.title: Toll the Dead Brain Explosion
best_moments.description: Valrex cast Toll the Dead and the necrotic bell chimes caused a Redbrand's brain to literally explode.

quotes.speaker: Darren/Valrex
quotes.text: Turns around, tolls on the dead as he sees him running for the fire mage. Hears the bells...

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Think of a giant bell just chiming around this guy. The sound of the reverberation is causing the necrotic damage. His brain just fizzles out and explodes.

best_moments.title: Chair to the Face
best_moments.description: Drunk Belden tried to say something witty about 'wood for the fire' but just yelled and threw a chair at a burning Redbrand.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: In his mind, he's thinking 'here's some wood for that fire,' but what comes out of his mouth is—he's gonna throw the chair at Redbrand A.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: As the chair smashes against him, he's going to get knocked back.

best_moments.title: Level 3!
best_moments.description: After the brutal street war, the party leveled up to Level 3, gaining new abilities like Metamagic for Semaj and Kaelia.

quotes.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes.text: Everyone, go ahead and level up to level three.

quotes.speaker: Richard/Semaj
quotes.text: Nice, I was waiting for that.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: The drunken master for the win—he was dodging every dude and killing everybody.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes_of_the_session.quote: I went into a big battle, killed a couple guys, and then went down in a blaze of glory. Woke up to dead bodies.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: His brain just fizzles out and explodes and falls down.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: He lunges into the air, catches the Redbrand by the throat. And he just starts ripping.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Sean/Belden
quotes_of_the_session.quote: I was dealing with the personal turmoil of losing a duel with a goblin.

quotes_of_the_session.speaker: Alex/GM
quotes_of_the_session.quote: Hammer smash face! It's a Cannibal Corpse song.

combat_encounters.name: Sleeping Giant Street War
combat_encounters.mvp_reason: Drunken Master performance - dodging and killing while hammered

character_spotlights.moment: MVP of the session. Drunk but deadly. Went down twice, kept getting back up, killed multiple Redbrands.
Got slashed multiple times but got revenge—ripped out a Redbrand's throat
character_spotlights.one_liner: He gives me a look that says 'I got this.'

character_spotlights.moment: Ended the fight by crushing the final Redbrand's skull into a wall. Also made a brain explode with Toll the Dead.
Set Redbrands on fire with Firebolts and Burning Hands, healing allies when needed

plot_developments: Established party as serious threat to Redbrand operations
Phandalin witnessed the party's combat prowess

end_state.next_objective: Deal with the Redbrand threat, find the Black Spider
